page.title: 08THE NEWSHEET OF KNEESALL,1
page.content: {Mrs Tapper}and{Mrs Widdowson}came to school to show us how to the Kneesall Knatter is put together.The ladies are the editors of the newsheet.The Kneesall Knatter's name was created in a competition and decided at the church fete.There was a former vicar called{Rev. Billy James. He stopped being the vicar of Kneesall and it was decided by the{Parish {Council}to branch out on their own and produce a news letter for the Kneesall area. When they are writing the newsheet the editors meet together one day each month.All the people around Kneesall bring their news in or send it in by telephone. Then they put it on a date sheet which has the dates on one side and they write down what is happening on the sheet.
